oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Education of the Deaf and Dumb, 1846-7
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Board of Trustees of the Tennessee Institution for the Education of the Deaf & Dumb
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: THE SECOND BIENNIAL REPORT OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES OF THE TENNESSEE INSTITUTION FOR THE EDUCATION OF THE DEAF & DUMB, TO THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF TENNESSEE, FOR 1846-7. NASHVILLE: PRINTED BY W. F. BANG & CO. BANNER OFFICE. 1847. Referred to as Tennessee Deaf and Dumb School. Later became Tennessee School for the Deaf.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Printed by W.F. Bang & Co., Nashville
